content.brief:
Much like businesses, agencies throughout the Federal government have a Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) who are responsible for ensuring the security of information assets. The CISO Council, a body of these agency executives, is dedicated to protecting the People's data.

Cyber.gov is the website of the Office of Management and Budget’s Cyber and National Security Unit (OMB Cyber), the United States Chief Information Security Officer, and the Chief Information Security Officers Council. Cyber.gov serves as a central collection of cybersecurity policies, best practices, and other resources that inform the public on how to protect themselves from cybersecurity threats.
